backend/main.mo: Implements message storage with create, list, delete-after-5-minutes, and trimming logic, enforcing limits and timestamps.
feature_evidence.json: Lists features, related files, components, and test IDs for tracking implementation evidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short predefined summaries for key frontend chat-related files.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles and a warm neutral color theme for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app layout with header, themed image, message feed, composer, and footer.
frontend/src/chat/backendClient.ts: Wraps actor methods to send, list, and delete messages with initialization checks.
frontend/src/chat/components/MessageComp: Textarea-based message input enforcing a 150â€‘char limit and sending via mutation with UI feedback.
frontend/src/chat/components/MessageFeed: Loads and displays messages with loading, error, and empty states including generated imagery.
frontend/src/chat/components/MessageItem: Shows a single message with timestamp, countdown to deletability, and a delete confirmation flow.
frontend/src/chat/queries.ts: React Query hooks for polling messages and managing send/delete mutations with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/chat/time.ts: Utility functions converting nanosecond timestamps to dates, checking message age, delete eligibility, and producing display-friendly timestamps.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, stored identity loading, logout, and exposing identity status through a provider and hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining a warm neutral theme with extensive OKLCH variables and dark mode overrides.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling custom OKLCH theme colors, typography, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing features, requirements, and generated image assets for the anonymous chat app.
